title: How to Install an Xbox 360 Game onto Your Console from a Disc

steps.headline: Turn off default auto-play.
steps.description: This step is optional, but is helpful in the goal. Just go to the Settings area on your home-screen (fully to the right) and select "Console settings." Go down to "Auto-play", and select "Disable".

steps.headline: Insert the game you want to install.
steps.description: Select a game and put the disk in the tray.

steps.headline: Install your game.
steps.description: All you have to do is go to the game title on your home-screen, where you would normally select to play, and press the X (blue) button. Then just go over to install and let it install your game.

text: Turn off default auto-play. This step is optional, but is helpful in the goal. Just go to the Settings area on your home-screen (fully to the right) and select "Console settings." Go down to "Auto-play", and select "Disable". Insert the game you want to install. Select a game and put the disk in the tray. Install your game. All you have to do is go to the game title on your home-screen, where you would normally select to play, and press the X (blue) button. Then just go over to install and let it install your game.
